Display UV and LiPo values

dev board Adafruit Feather Bluefruit
chip nRF52
chip VEML6075
sensor UV Index
features lipo display

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Adafruit nRF52 Arduino
  • Adafruit VEML6075
  • Adafruit SHARP Memory display

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky nRF52
  2. UV sensor
  3. SHARP display
  4. Display UV values

Buy the components

  1. Solderless breadboard
  2. Adafruit Feather nRF52 Bluefruit LE
  3. Adafruit SHARP Memory Monochrome Display Breakout 168x144 pixels

Code

Download code display-uv-lipo.ino

Makefile

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

Display UV sensor values with a LiPo

Hardware:

  1. Adafruit Bluefruit nRF52 breakout board
  2. Adafruit SHARP Memory Monochrome Display Breakout 168x144 pixels
  3. Adafruit UV sensor breakout board
  4. LiPo 1200mAh 3.7V

References

  1. Adafruit SHARP memory display firmware
  2. Display LiPo battery voltage firmware
